about_the_game:
[Cute Puzzle MAX]

In commemoration of the launch of a new game, the price has been reduced to half price! *(Prices may be restored at a later date.)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Brain training in a little free time!
The basic rule is simple, same as Minesweeper.
When the panel opens, sexy images are displayed.
3 pictures (+ difference), but it's completely free so please try.

Illustrations increased by 12 pictures, there are also paid versions.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Erroneously detect by security software.]


Because this product is an original program, security software may find false positives.
This product is simply a game and the program is safe, so please disregard such warnings.
Please add it to your security software's safe list if this poses a problem.


However, there are reports that illegal uploads outside of steam include programs unknown to the developers.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Latest game information

name: Cute Puzzle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7 / Windows8 / Windows10 / Windows11
  • Processor: Intel Atom CPU Z3735F 1.33Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
